name: Funguy (Whare Mātoro (Otago Games Space))
description:
Funguy is a dark 2D side-scrolling endless runner where an intrepid mushroom man, Funguy, must leap over deadly hazards at a steadily increasing pace.

How long will Funguy survive his dangerous run? That's up to you!

By Cedric Lina, Winter Garcia Paez and Elijah Samson.

Created during their first year of the Bachelor of Communication Design at Otago Polytechnic, 2022.

Supported by tutors Lisa Blakie and Josiah Hunt, and mentors Rick Stem II and Edwin McRae.
